sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"断言，声称"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: assert, affirm, allege, maintain, testify, claim
means: assert ：主观意味强，指自认为某事就是如此，而不管事实如何。
affirm ：侧重在作出断言时表现出的坚定与不可动摇的态度。
allege ：多指无真凭实据，不提供证据的断言或宣称。
maintain ：与assert近义，但前者指坚决维护某种主张或观点。
testify ：多指在法庭作证，庄严地宣称自己所说属实。
claim ：可与assert换用，但语气弱一些，侧重指行为自己的权利提出要求他人承认。

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Helm plans to assert that the bill violates the First Amendment.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫尔姆先生打算声明该法案违反了宪法第一修正案。

sentence.Network_en: The defendants, who continue to assert their innocence, are expected to appeal.
sentence.Network_cn: 各被告仍然坚称无辜，预计会提起上诉。

sentence.Network_en: She continued to assert that she was innocent.

list.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... assert ? vt. 主张,声明,断言 assertive adj. 过分自信的，有进取心的 assess ? v. 估价，评价.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... assertion 主张 assertive 断定的 assertively 断言地.
过度自信（Assertiveness）是你想询问和想告诉的程度，其实是衡量你自己影响他人的程度。如果你倾向于多告诉，那么你是属于很 …
因为到处都是通过感觉、联想、类比而来的论断（assertion），而不是有逻辑力量的论证。比如他选定的26位文学大师中竟有弗洛伊 …
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... ascending powers of X X 的升幂 assertion 断语; 断定 associative law 结合律.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin asserere 'claim, affirm', from ad- 'to' + serere 'to join'

encyclopedia.content: 编写代码时，我们总是会做出一些假设，断言就是用于在代码中捕捉这些假设，可以将断言看作是异常处理的一种高级形式。断言表示为一些布尔表达式，程序员相信在程序中的某个特定点该表达式值为真。可以在任何时候启用和禁用断言验证，因此可以在测试时启用断言，而在部署时禁用断言。同样，程序投入运行后，最终用户在遇到问题时可以重新起用断言。

entry.def: If someone asserts a fact or belief, they state it firmly.

example.ex: Mr. Helm plans to assert that the bill violates the First Amendment...
example.tran: 赫尔姆先生打算声明该法案违反了宪法第一修正案。

example.ex: The defendants, who continue to assert their innocence, are expected to appeal...
example.tran: 各被告仍然坚称无辜，预计会提起上诉。

entry.def: If you assert your authority, you make it clear by your behaviour that you have authority.

example.ex: After the war, the army made an attempt to assert its authority in the south of the country...
example.tran: 战后，军队试图在该国的南部地区维护其统治地位。

example.ex: The people have asserted their power and that will be very difficult to reverse.
example.tran: 人民已经维护了其当家作主的权力，这将难以改变。

entry.def: If you assert your right or claim to something, you insist that you have the right to it.

example.ex: The republics began asserting their right to govern themselves.
example.tran: 各加盟共和国开始要求获得自治权。

entry.tran: 坚持（自己）的主张;表现坚定
entry.def: If you assert yourself, you speak and act in a forceful way, so that people take notice of you.

example.ex: He's speaking up and asserting himself confidently.
example.tran: 他明确表态，信心十足地阐述自己的观点。

means.word_mean: 2. to declare or affirm solemnly and formally as true;

sentences.sentence: "Before God I swear I am innocent"

means.word_mean: 3. insist on having one's opinions and rights recognized;

auth_sentence.content: Essentially what you assert is that scripture was mistranslated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Essentially what you assert is that scripture was mistranslated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Essentially what you assert is that scripture was mistranslated.

auth_sentence.content: I assert that your evidence of that is lacking.
auth_sentence.res_content: I assert that your evidence of that is lacking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I assert that your evidence of that is lacking.

auth_sentence.content: But Schmidt has done little to assert his authority.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Schmidt has done little to assert his authority.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Schmidt has done little to assert his authority.

stems_affixes.word_buile: assert[v.断言,宣称;坚持;主张[权利,权威等]]+ive……的→adj.言语果断的,断言的
de离开+sert加入,插入,连接→不再加入→抛弃→沙漠[无连接,联系的地方]
insert[v.插入,嵌入;登载 n.插入物]+ion表名词→n.插入,插入物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 断言,宣称;坚持;主张[权利,权威等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强+sert加入,插入,连接→强行加入[观点]→断言
de离开+sert加入,插入,连接→不再加入→抛弃→沙漠[无连接,联系的地方]
ex出,表示超出+sert加入,插入,连接→exert尽[力],努力
ex出+sert加入,插入,连接→插出去→突出

Sentence.sentence: The latest congressional report acknowledges the critical importance of technical training, but also asserts that the study of the humanities (人文学科)and social sciences must remain central components of America's educational system at all levels.

But rarely, if ever, do they publicly take the argument a step further, asserting that a growing manufacturing sector encourages craftsmanship and that craftsmanship is, if not a birthright, then a vital ingredient of the American self-image as a can-do, inventive, we-can-make-anything people.

sentences.en: He asserted his ideas loudly and clearly.
sentences.cn: 他大声明确地说出自己的想法。

sentences.en: Her friends asserted that she was innocent.
sentences.cn: 她的朋友断言她是无罪的。

sentences.en: She asserted the charge to be incorrect.
sentences.cn: 她断言这起指控是不正确的。

jushi.english: He wished to assert himself at work but did not know how to do it.
jushi.chinese: 他希望在工作中显示自己的权威,可是不知道如何去做。
她果断地说出了自己的意见。
